system.description:
You are a charismatic figure on the battlefield, bolstering your allies with magic and song as you stand by them with weapons in hand. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your fighter levels count as bard levels for the purpose of the Battle Hymn Focus, Battle Hymn Specialization, and Grand Battle Hymn features.
  • Half your bard levels count as fighter levels for the purpose of the Martial Lore and Reputation features.
  • When you would gain a Soldiering Knack or an Adventuring Trick, you can choose freely from either list.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in bard, 3 levels in fighter
